[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skinâ€™s natural barrier.

B0D234S4MX.description: Wrap yourself in decadent fragrant goodness when you wear the Bodycology Whipped Vanilla Fragrance Body Mist. With just a spritz or two before your day begins, you can carry the gorgeous scent of Vanilla Blossom, Asian Pear, and Jasmine with you for hours. Sweet and decadent, we created this fragrance with indulgence in mind. Ideal for a light refresh during the day, you can spritz it on your wrists, neck, and shoulders for a light fragrance. If you are looking for something stronger, we recommend spraying the mist into the air and allowing it to fall gently onto your skin. Luxurious, sweet, and the perfect amount of fragrant, this fragrance mist will quickly become a part of your beauty routine. This fragrance mist is the perfect follow-up after moisturizing with our Bodycology Whipped Vanilla Shea Butter Body Cream. Mix and match with our other fragrance mists to create a scent that is uniquely yours. All Bodycology products are paraben, phthalate, and cruelty-free.

B01KYRUBT8.product_name: Al-Rehab Choco Musk Eau de Parfum Spray for Women, 1.65 oz/50 ml
B01KYRUBT8.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
B01KYRUBT8.description: Choco Musk is not just a fragrance; it's a delicate dance of sweet shades that captivates the senses. The delightful aroma begins with the chic allure of white musk, falling under the spell of incomparable white chocolate. Each note in the composition complements the other, creating a harmonious blend that emphasizes without overwhelming. As the fragrance unfolds, the middle notes gently merge, introducing spicy cinnamon, creamy vanilla, and the enchanting essence of rose. The base notes add a touch of oriental mystique, with exciting amber and myrrh weaving together with a noble sandalwood tint. The result is a sweet harmony that plays with shades of dessert perfumes in all their splendor. Choco Musk is a delicacy that transcends seasons, inviting you into a fairy-tale captivity of sweet indulgence. Whether it's the warmth of summer or the coziness of winter, let this fragrance be your year-round temptation, teasing and charming those around you. The 50ml Eau de Parfum bottle is an elegant testament to the luxurious experience that awaits you. With its refined design, it complements the richness of the fragrance within, enhancing the overall indulgence. Choco Musk isn't just a fragrance; it's a captivating tale of sweet temptation. Let it be your daily indulgence, a sensory journey into the heart of dessert-inspired luxury.
features: Choco Musk Eau de Parfum by Al-Rehab is a Aromatic fragrance for women
Top Notes: White Musk, Milk Chocolate and Vanilla
Middle Notes: Cinnamon, Rose and Sandalwood
Base Notes: Myrrh, Amber And Spicy Notes
Long lasting fragrance

B07F12SZDS.description:
Beetles No Wipe Top Coat and Base Coat: Enjoy long-lasting wear for over 28 days with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat prevents nicks, chips, and smudges. Tip: The base coat is designed to remain sticky, providing a solid foundation for the next coat of polish. (Note: The base gel should not be used as glue.)
High-Quality and Protective: Beetles Glossy No Wipe Top Coat and base, with proper application, can last with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat avoids nicks, chips, or smudges. Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.

B0C4BXZRTX.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Baked Double Take Powder Foundation - Light - Buildable Medium to Full Coverage - Matte Finish
B0C4BXZRTX.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation
B0C4BXZRTX.description:
DOUBLE TAKE BAKED BUILDABLE FULL COVERAGE POWDER FOUNDATION: Get skin that gets a double take. This foundation gives you instant elegance with full coverage, a classic matte finish that's never cakey, and a long-wear formula that doesn't fade. Handmade in Italy, the creamy formula feels like a treat for skin.
LIGHT: Light beige with warm yellow undertones
ANTI-AGING INGREDIENTS: With antioxidant-rich Jojoba Seed Oil that softens and soothes skin, Centella Asiatica Extract that hydrates and mitigates sun damage, and anti-aging Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, there's plenty to love about how this foundation looks and feels. Not only will it stay on all day, your skin will be better for it.
PERFECT FOR: This full-coverage foundation for mature skin is dermatologist-approved and safe for those with sensitive skin. It earned the National Psoriasis Foundation Seal of Recognition and carries the National Rosacea Society Seal of Acceptance.
HOW TO APPLY: You can use this matte foundation makeup wet or dry with the included dual-sided pink and white applicator sponge. For dry application, apply foundation with the pink side of the sponge. Gently dab the powder, pat it on the areas that need the most attention first, then blend outward and upward. For more serious coverage, apply it wet with the white side of the sponge. Dampen the sponge, dab the powder and pat onto face then blend outward and upward until fully blended.

B0012BNVE8.description: Menâ€™s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technologyâ€”a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)â€”to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8â€“12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If youâ€™re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.

Scalp conditioning technology: Tricho-Prime technology with botanical extracts and emollients conditions scalp and keeps follicles open; alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) exfoliates gently to enhance minoxidil absorption and support hair growth products.

**Biolage Color Last Shampoo: Vibrant Color, Lasting Shine** Experience the brilliance of Biolage Color Last Shampoo, your ultimate solution for color-treated hair. Infused with a powerful blend of soybean oil and stearic acid, this low-pH formula gently cleanses while preserving your hair's vibrant color and radiant shine. Say goodbye to dullness and fading, and embrace locks that stay true to tone, wash after wash. **Key Benefits:** - Preserves color depth and tone - Enhances shine and smoothness - Nourishes and strengthens hair - Prevents color fade for up to 4 weeks* - Delivers 35% more shine after just one use* - Makes hair 13x smoother and 2x stronger* **How It Works:** Our carefully calibrated color care concentrate, featuring antioxidant-rich soybean oil and protective stearic acid, forms a lightweight veil over each strand, shielding it from color-damaging aggressors. This dynamic duo nourishes, conditions, and seals in moisture, leaving your color-treated hair feeling soft, smooth, and irresistibly healthy. **A Sustainable Choice:** At Biolage, we believe in beauty without compromise. Our Color Last Shampoo is proudly vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without parabens, mineral oil, or colorants. Plus, our bottles and caps are made from 100% recycled plastic, so you can feel good about your choice for both your hair and the planet. **Experience the Biolage Difference:** Biolage is a leader in professional haircare, dedicated to providing salon-quality results at home. Our Color Last Shampoo is part of our comprehensive range of haircare solutions, designed to meet the unique needs of color-treated hair. Discover the power of Biolage and elevate your haircare routine today. **Usage:** For best results, apply Biolage Color Last Shampoo to wet hair, lather with a gentle massaging motion, and rinse thoroughly. Pair with Biolage Color Last Conditioner for optimal color protection and nourishment.
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality hair care products powered by botanicals

B0FFW9SQRW.product_name: Organic Grass-Fed Beef Tallow Balm with Raw Honey - Moisturizing Cream for Soft, Smooth Skin - Handmade All-Natural Moisturizer (2 Oz, Unscented)
B0FFW9SQRW.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
B0FFW9SQRW.description:
Say good-bye to chemical filled moisturizers, and say hello to nature's intended skincare. We make every batch of our Honey Tallow Balm with the highest quality Grass Fed Beef Tallow, Olive Oil, and Raw Honey. Through a meticulous rendering and clarifying process, we produce a pure tallow for our balms, ensuring the highest standard of excellence in every jar.
Skin support: Grass-fed Beef tallow is renowned for its nutrient-rich properties. Packed with vitamins A, D, E, and K, our balm provides essential nutrients for optimal skin health without the need for added fillers or artificial ingredients.
Encourages healthy skin: Experience whole-body moisture as our balm effortlessly hydrates your face, hands, feet, and beyond. Absorbing easily without any greasy or gritty feel, it's suitable for all skin types, offering relief for acne, dry skin, and sensitive skin.
Premium quality: At Terra Lotus, we're dedicated to delivering skincare solutions that prioritize both effectiveness and sustainability. Our small-batch production process utilizes only the finest organic ingredients, ensuring a product you can trust.
**Made in the USA**, 100% family owned and handmade. Not satisfied with your order? Contact us for a full refund, no questions asked.

We make every batch of our Honey Tallow Balm with the highest quality Grass Fed Beef Tallow, Olive Oil, and Raw Honey. Through a meticulous rendering and clarifying process, we produce a pure tallow for our balms, ensuring the highest standard of excellence in every jar.

Skin support: Grass-fed Beef tallow is renowned for its nutrient-rich properties. Packed with vitamins A, D, E, and K, our balm provides essential nutrients for optimal skin health without the need for added fillers or artificial ingredients.

Encourages healthy skin: Experience whole-body moisture as our balm effortlessly hydrates your face, hands, feet, and beyond. Absorbing easily without any greasy or gritty feel, it's suitable for all skin types, offering relief for acne, dry skin, and sensitive skin.

Premium quality: At Terra Lotus, we're dedicated to delivering skincare solutions that prioritize both effectiveness and sustainability. Our small-batch production process utilizes only the finest organic ingredients, ensuring a product you can trust.
**Made in the USA**, 100% family owned and handmade. Not satisfied with your order? Contact us for a full refund, no questions asked.

Anti-Aging Effect: Under eye patches with collagen as an anti-aging component prevent the formation of wrinkles and 24K nano gold with a protective effect helps prevent your skin from sagging.
Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles Treatment: Under eye patches are highly effective eye skin care treatments that will quickly work against skin aging, flat wrinkles & fine lines, eliminate dark circles, remove puffiness, and speed up the cell and collagen rejuvenation.
